Another great article! Really enjoyed reading this and the others too.   Anyway, just want to highlight that not all loans are equal and shouldn‚Äôt always be seen as a bad thing. Yours is an education loan, which is akin to borrowing time to repay money in exchange for learning skills and potentially higher pay, which is a positive trade-off in and of itself. That you picked up financial literacy lessons makes it another win for you too! As opposed to say credit card loan, which is often a negative trade-off if for example, it is an impulse purchase with little benefits. A bit simplistic, but you get the drift. üôÇ
